verse.name: v1
verse.lines: See, amid the winter's snow, born for us on earth below, see the tender Lamb appears, promised from eternal years.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Hail! Thou ever-blessed morn! Hail, redemption's happy dawn! Sing through all Jerusalem, "Christ is born in Bethlehem."

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lo, within a manger lies He who built the starry skies; He, who throned in height sublime, sits amid the cherubim! [Refrain]

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Say, ye holy shepherds, say, what your joyful news today; wherefore have ye left your sheep on the lonely mountain steep? [Refrain]

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: "As we watched at dead of night, lo, we saw a wondrous light; angels, singing 'Peace on earth' told us of the Savior's birth." [Refrain]

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Sacred Infant, all divine, what a tender love was Thine; thus to come from highest bliss down to such a world as this! [Refrain]

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Teach, O teach us, Holy Child, by Thy face so meek and mild, teach us to resemble Thee in Thy sweet humility! [Refrain]
